---
title: IUsbmuxdApi.usbmuxd_disconnect method
---

Disconnect. For now, this just closes the socket file descriptor.

```csharp
public int usbmuxd_disconnect(int sfd)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| sfd | socket file descriptor returned by usbmuxd_connect() |

## Return Value

0 on success, -1 on error.
